meanings.definition: The rounded, protective shell covering the back of a turtle.
meanings.sent1: The turtlebacks of the turtle help keep it safe from harm.
meanings.sent2: The turtlebacks of the turtle are hard and sturdy.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous raccoon tried to climb on the turtlebacks for a ride.
meanings.sent4: The turtlebacks of the turtle are like nature's own shield.
meanings.sent5: Children love to touch the turtlebacks and feel their unique texture.

meanings.definition: A type of roofing tile that is curved and overlapping, resembling the shell of a turtle.
meanings.sent1: The old house had turtlebacks on its roof, giving it a charming look.
meanings.sent2: The turtlebacks on the roof were designed to withstand heavy rain.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide acorns under the turtlebacks on the roof.
meanings.sent4: The turtlebacks on the roof provided a quirky touch to the building.
meanings.sent5: The sun glinted off the turtlebacks, creating a beautiful pattern on the roof.
